title: CHOREO NIGHT
description:
The stage's heating up, so get your spirits ignited, as it's time for you to put on a costume of 
confidence and flaunt your moves with your crew. Prepare to leave a mark on the dance floor!
registration: Entry fee is Rs 275 per head.
Bonafide of all the team members should be submitted through google forms.
Registration has to be done through online means.
This event comes under premium registration.
Only a limited number of slots will be available
Participants must be present inside the college premises before 2 pm.

prelims:
The google form has to be filled and a video of the team's performance has to be 
            uploaded through the same
Only a single non edited video should be submitted
Minimum duration of the video hould be 3 minutes
Last day for video submission is on or before 10th of February 2024
finals: The time limit for each performance is 7 minutes
Vulgarity and obsecenity during performance will not be tolerated

A minimum of 8 and maximum of 30 members, inclusive of backstage helpers will be 
            allowed to step onto the stage
Any acts of vandalization to the stage or any other properties/devices will be viewed seriously.
Every participating team must be present inside the venue before the informed time.
